summary.para: Creates an encrypted Windows app package from an unencrypted one.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: A readable stream from the app bundle to encrypt.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the bundle. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: exemptedFiles
param.para: Files exempted from the package writer.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Creates objects for encrypting Windows app packages and bundles.
